user_query: I'm researching the Prague Stock Exchange and need some data. Can you fetch the trades for a specific stock and also provide the list of available stocks on the exchange? Moreover, find the leaderboard rank of some traders on Binance Futures Leaderboard.

TaskList.description: Fetch the list of available stocks on the Prague Stock Exchange.
Fetch the trades for a specific stock on the Prague Stock Exchange. (Step 2 requires the specific stock identified in Step 1)
Retrieve the leaderboard rank of some traders on Binance Futures.
